Commands.Metsu: 1-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack  Grants 「Small Speed Up」 for 3 turns
Commands.Sai: 2-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  Grants 「Small Attack Up」 and 「Wind」 stance for 3 turns   While 「Wind」 stance is active:  - Turns 「Metsu」 to 「Metsu+」  　∟ 1-HIT Wind AoE ranged BRV attack  - Turns 「Sai」 to 「Sai+」  　∟ 2-HIT Wind melee BRV+HP attack  - Turns 「BRV Attack」 to 「BRV Attack++」  　∟ 1-HIT Wind ranged BRV attack
Commands.Delay Attack All Throw: 1-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack  Delays target(s) by 1 turn  Slightly raises party Attack for 3 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

Passives.Metsu Light: Slightly lowers Action Delay after using  Metsu ,  Metsu+
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence
Passives.Debuff Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Sai Light: Slightly lowers Action Delay after using  Sai ,  Sai+
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Passives.Start Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 3 turns when the battle starts
Passives.Storm and Stress: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Max BRV while  Wind  stance is active
Passives.Wind Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while  Wind  stance is active
Passives.Metsu Extend: Metsu  use +1When using  Metsu ,  Metsu+ :- Slightly raises BRV potency- Slightly improves  Speed Up - Lowers Action Delay.
Passives.Wind Boost All: Slightly raises party Max BRV while  Wind  stance is active
Passives.Sai Extend: Sai  use +2When using  Sai ,  Sai+ :- Tremendously raises BRV potency- Slightly improves  Attack Up - Grants  Wind Enchant  to party for 6 turns
Passives.Resonance of Destruction and Power: Raises party Max BRV and Attack by 10%
Passives.Delay Attack All Throw Extend: When using  Delay Attack All Throw :- Marginally improves  Attack Up  effect

Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Delay Attack All Throw  use +1Duration of  Delay Attack All Throw  effects +2 turns
Weapons.Dazzling Moonring CP: 35: When using  Sai ,  Sai+ :- Raises BRV potency- Inflicts  Wind Resistance Down  for 4 turnsImproves  Attack Up  and extends its durationExtends the duration of  Wind  stance
Weapons.Fujin's Chakram CP: 15: When using  Metsu ,  Metsu+ :- Raises BRV potency- Monderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- Improves  Speed Up , extends its duration and grants it to allies too
